law.catch_line: Guardian or conservator may consider benefits of establishing a special needs trust.
law.text: In developing and establishing a plan to preserve and protect a ward's assets pursuant to this chapter, a guardian, conservator, or limited conservator may consider the benefits to the ward of establishing a special needs trust for the ward.
law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 8, effective July 12, 2012.
